abstracts.cdata!:
The Eleventh Industrial Imports Program
            Credit Project will: assist in financing the foreign
            exchange cost of imported raw materials and components
            required by exporters of manufacturers; finance the foreign
            exchange cost of foreign know-how and balancing equipment to
            improve price competitiveness and productivity of selected
            IDA beneficiaries, primarily exporters, and enable selected
            priority industries to maintain and expand their production
            by supplying part of their requirements of foreign exchange
            for imports of raw materials, components, and spares.
